content: pb& w princess buttercup & westley does fun things to self-striping yarns but will also look wonderful in solids semi-solids and tonals knit cuff down with traditional heel flap/ gusset and wedge toe construction the pattern has instructions for a lacy version princess buttercup and a non-lacy version westley pattern has both charts and written instructions instructions are included for mirroring the pattern sample westley version shown in hiwassee creek dyeworks sassafras black ice colorway 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/hiwassee-creek-dyeworks
